title: Mighty Quill
description: A Steamy MM Paranormal Shifter Romance Cassian Rhodes is just a normal guy going through normal college stuff: Weird roommate? Check. Panic over grades? Check. Hockey Shenanigans? Check. Sexuality Crisis? Uh… Falling for your roommate? Hold on… Finding out your new BF’s family is magic? Wait, WTF!? MIGHTY QUILL is a roommates to idiots to lovers, bi awakening, paranormal shifter romance. Lots of steam, fluff & magic goodness. Author's note: Quill is a mystery and it does contain some mentions of gore, body horror, & assault
author: Emmaline Strange
